WebGLVertexArrayObject.summary: The WebGLVertexArrayObject interface is part of the WebGL 2 API, represents vertex array objects (VAOs) pointing to vertex array data, and provides names for different sets of vertex data.

remarks.para: When working with WebGLVertexArrayObject objects, the following methods are useful:

blockquote.para: The extension allows you to use vertex array objects in a WebGL 1 context.
